Notes: An invisible point that teleports the player to another position, just like a Warp Pipe. However, this works in one way only. The destination point needs to be specified using a GeneralPos called マリオ顔惑星煙突出口.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
